channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- ThinkPad T14s X13 Gen3 BIOS - Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- ThinkPad T14s X13 Gen3 BIOS - Windows

item.title: CVE-2022-48183|2024-08-03T15:02:36.783Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad%20t14s%20x13%20gen3%20bios%20-%20windows
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 and X13 Gen3 that could cause the BIOS tamper detection mechanism to not trigger under specific circumstances which could allow unauthorized access.

item.title: CVE-2022-48182|2024-08-03T15:02:36.729Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad%20t14s%20x13%20gen3%20bios%20-%20windows
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 and X13 Gen3 that could cause the BIOS tamper detection mechanism to not trigger under specific circumstances which could allow unauthorized access.
